title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: First you have some speed activities with other candidates. After this, you have an interview with the team leader. The interview has many questions about you, (strengths and weakness), why do you want the join them.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to join AIESEC?

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIESEC (Porto, Oporto)
Interview Descriptions: Candidatura, dinâmica de grupo com mais 2 pessoas e 2 pessoas a avaliar, entrevista de uma hora de duração com 2 pessoas também, série de atividades 4 no total que é necessário realizar e ser bem sucedido
Interview Questions: Qual é o snak favorito? Vende-me esse snack.

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: The process starts by submitting your CV, which is then followed by a group dynamic activity and then an interview. The group dynamic was interesting, the interview was not hard but it did not go well for me.
Interview Questions: You have a set of people, who would you bring to a desert island.

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: The recruiters were very informal. They asked personal questions and then more technical questions related to the job. The recruitment process was easy and allowed me to find out more about the organization and myself.
Interview Questions:
What is leadership?
Tell me something about you

title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: Thorough and complete. It was based on a group dynamic followed by a personal interview. The group dynamic placed us in two different situations, the first was a moral dillema and the second was the creation of a project related to one of the UN 's SGD.
Interview Questions:
Leadership experiences
What would I do to help a colleague with a lower work performance
How I felt about working with objectives

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions:
1st - a littler video introduction about AIESEC
2nd - group dynamic with a few scenarios (choose an SDG and justify investing in it; it's the end of the world and you have to choose 9 people to go to a bunker, the group has to reach consensus, etc)
3rd - individual interview
Interview Questions:
- Why are you a good fit for AIESEC?
- Who, in your opinion, can be described as a leader? If you could have dinner with that person, what would you talk about?
- Explain to a 5 y/o why they had to stay quarantined
- Sell a comb to a bald man
- Convince me to eat broccoli
- 3 difficulties you've had to overcome and what you learned from them
- what makes you mad?

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at AIESEC (Lisbon, Lisbon District) in Sept 2017
Interview Descriptions: I got interviewed at my college by two girls. They had the questions on their computer and just read them and wrote what I answered. Also showed me a power point about the company.
Interview Questions: Who are you?

title: HR Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at AIESEC (Braga) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: It was amazing, they have really cool values and they were super nice in the team interview and individual interview. They started by explaining AIESEC's mission and every area in the office.
Interview Questions: Qualities that I would like in my team

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: First I had an individual interview with standar questions. Then I was invited to a group dynamics session where we had to solve a case study and we were evaluated based on our iteraction.
Interview Questions:
What are your strenght and weaknesses?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: International Public Relations Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at AIESEC (Lisbon, Lisbon District) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: I applied on online, was selected and received a call and got an appointment for interview. The process was very easy and confortable, they were very professional and clear in their proposal.
Interview Questions: What qualities and weakness I have as a professional.

Interview Questions: Why do you want to join AIESEC?
